INSERT INTO tb_group ( sid, app_meta_name, open_g_id, is_offical, has_culling, culling_share_img, create_time, description, member_count, group_name, culling_count, group_rulers, remark, accusations, sortt, del_flag, create_by, create_dt, update_by, update_dt, versionn ) values( #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appMetaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openGId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isOffical,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hasCulling,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cullingShareImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cullingCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupRulers,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accusations,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sortt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{versionn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

SELECT @@IDENTITY
